long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Expand your German vocabulary with the spelling bee game (https://6mal5.com/wortify/) and this extension!

Whenever you feel stuck finding a word, click on the icon, and it will show you the Wiktionary entry with the definition of the next most frequent word.

To avoid frustration, the word list has been pre-filtered so that it's guaranteed that the game will accept each suggestion.
